creator: jason@beatpimpsyndicate.com
text:
Using the MSI installer, everything is cool, successful install. After trying 
to start the service I get an error saying 

"No installed service named apache", 

ok, so now I test the configuration and get this error message 

"Syntax error on line 238 of C:/Progam Files...... <Directory> directive 
missing closing '>' ". So I check the config file which has no missing '>'.

I am not sure where to send the error log file, but i can and will if this 
problem is indeed a bug.

creator: jason@beatpimpsyndicate.com
text:
Created attachment 6563
error log for apache syntax error

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
Actually needed to see line 238 to resolve this, care to attach the resulting
https.conf file?
